title: MANUFACTURING OR TRIMMING HEAD COVERINGS, e.g. HATS
definition_statement: This place covers: Details of manufacturing head coverings and appliances or trimmings therefor.

title: Manufacturing hats
definition_statement: This place covers: Details of manufacturing hats.

title: Manufacturing helmets by processes not otherwise provided for
definition_statement: This place covers: Details of manufacturing helmets.

title: {In-mould forming}
informative_references: Shaping by internal pressure generated in the material, e.g. swelling, foamingIncorporating or moulding on preformed partsShaping by blow-mouldingShaping by thermoformingShaping composites,i.e. plastics material comprising reinforcements, fillers or preformed parts, e.g. inserts
definition_statement: This place covers: Manufacturing of helmets whereby an inner layer is moulded directly into an outer hard shell.

title: {Forming from solid sheets}
definition_statement: This place covers: Forming helmet shells from solid sheets of material (can be metal or plastic).

title: {Manufacturing custom-sized helmets}
definition_statement: This place covers: Helmets custom-made to fit the head of an individual.

title: Miscellaneous appliances for hat-making, e.g. for making wire forms for hat-frames  (sewing-machines for straw hats D05B; sewing- machines for making hat-brims D05B); Apparatus for changing the form or size of finished hats
informative_references: Sewing-machines for straw hats; sewing-machines for making hat-brims

title: Fittings or trimmings for hats, e.g. hat-bands
Sweat-bands
definition_statement: This place covers: Sweat-bands to be used inside the hat to absorb sweat.

title: Subject matter not provided for in other groups of this subclass
definition_statement: This place covers: This group is not used.
